PushManagerPermissionState.summary:
The permissionState() method of the
interface returns a {{jsxref("Promise")}} that resolves to a
string indicating the permission state of the push manager. Possible
values are 'prompt', 'denied', or 'granted'.

blockquote.para:
Note: As of Firefox 44, the permissions for Notifications and Push have been merged. If permission is
granted for notifications, push will also be enabled.

PushManagerPermissionState.returns:
A that resolves to a string with a value of
'prompt', 'denied', or 'granted'.
